name: MorningSikhPrayer
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: morning sikh prayer
des:
Japji Sahib is a Sikh prayer, that appears at the beginning of the Guru Granth Sahib – the scripture of the Sikhs. It was composed by Guru Nanak, the founder of Sikhism. It begins with Mool Mantra and then follow 38 paudis and completed with a final Salok at the end of this composition.
You can say phrases like "start," "play," "open," "begin," Morning Sikh Prayer to start playing blissfull Japji Saheb. You can pause and resume any time. You can also say stop and then again start from beginning by saying Play Sikh Morning Prayer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
